item.title: Poor Road sign, 15th November
item.description:
Many of the road signs are missing or have disappeared. This could cause confusion and safety issues for driver and cyclists
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deptford Bridge, Deptford, Lewisham, London Borough of Lewisham

item.title: Dumped rubbish, situated on Edward Road against the lamppost near corner of Adelaide Road, 15th November
item.description:
Unsightly flytipped rubbish on Edward Road near the corner of Adelaide Road. It's now encouraging other disposed of rubbish, a plastic bottle and food wrapper has been placed on top of it since it was left on Thursday evening/night.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Edward Road, Chislehurst, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive amount of household rubbish dumped, 15th November
item.description:
A large amount of clothing, household items, disassembled furniture, and general rubbish has been fly tipped near the tree directly in front of 470-476 Kingsland rd. None of it has been disposed of in proper bin bags, & is just encouraging more fly tipping

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Red pedestrian light crossing isn’t working, 15th November
item.description:
The Red pedestrian crossing light is out by the glades entrance. Green and the timer is working but crucially not the Red.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ethelbert Road, Plaistow, Bromley, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Council sweepers have simply left leaves here for weeks, 15th November
item.description:
Great that Lambeth has employed someone to make a start on clearing leaves from pavements so that the public don’t slip and slide everywhere (given the volume of them). But why haven’t the bags they left here more than 3 weeks ago still not been collected?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Goldsboro' Road, Vauxhall, London Borough of Lambeth
Report on FixMyStreet
